plot: Two dimwits find a machine that can see anywhere in the world, so naturally they tune it in to areas of the globe where women are taking their clothes off.
title: The Peek Snatchers
plot_es: Two dimwits find a machine that can see anywhere in the world, so naturally they tune it in to areas of the globe where women are taking their clothes off.
plot_en: Two dimwits find a machine that can see anywhere in the world, so naturally they tune it in to areas of the globe where women are taking their clothes off.
